title: Get an award-winning VPN for an extra 10% off for a limited time
description:
Cybersecurity isn’t just something corporations have to worry about. Everyone who uses the internet should at least have the security of a VPN when they’re connecting to public Wi-Fi. There are many VPNs to choose from, so it can feel overwhelming to make the right choice for you.

If you’re looking for a fast VPN with high-quality security at a budget price point, it’s a good time to shop. That’s because between 4/5 and 4/11, you can get a lifetime subscription to Ivacy VPN for an extra 10% off our already discounted price when you use promo code IVACY10.

Ivacy won the 2019 BestVPN.com Fastest VPN Award, indicative of its blazing-fast speeds that support secure P2P file-sharing and seamless browsing experience. You’ll protect your connection with powerful 256-bit encryption and have access to more than 1,000 servers in 100 locations worldwide, allowing you to bypass geo-restrictions and embrace true internet freedom. All the while, you’ll enjoy a strict no-logging policy that ensures you remain completely anonymous while browsing, streaming, and more.

Between 4/5 and 11:59 pm on 4/11, you can get a lifetime subscription for 10-device support on Ivacy VPN for the specially reduced price of just $27.99. Just use promo code IVACY10.

 

Ivacy VPN: Lifetime Subscription – $27.99
